-  GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments

App Store Connect API## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)

`limit``integer`
